Marta Cavalli hit by driver on training ride

On Friday, FDJ-Suez announced the news that Marta Cavalli had been hit by a car while training near her home in Italy. Fortunately, after 24 hours of medical observation, she has avoided serious injury with no fractures reported. The cause of the crash is under investigation.

Cavalli has not had the best of fortunes with injuries in recent years.
